title: Why Are Black Americans So Underrepresented in the Workplace? | Seth Stoughton & D.L. Hughley
itunes:title: Why Are Black Americans So Underrepresented in the Workplace? | Seth Stoughton & D.L. Hughley
description:
Trevor examines Black employment barriers, talks to "Evaluating Police Uses of Force" co-author Seth Stoughton and interviews D.L. Hughley about "Surrender, White People!"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
